name: instructions
description: Detailed guidelines for the main character's behavior, personality, and decision-making process in the game

name: actions
description: Comprehensive list of all available actions the character can perform, including their effects and any prerequisites

name: logs
description: Chronological record of all previous actions executed by the character, including timestamps and outcomes

name: game_info
description: Essential information about the game world, including current location, time, and any relevant environmental factors

name: player_info
description: Key player statistics and attributes, rated on a scale of Very Bad, Bad, Normal, Good, or Very Good. 'Bad' indicates need for improvement, while 'Good' signifies satisfactory performance

name: inventory
description: Detailed list of items currently in the player's possession, including quantities and any special properties

name: warnings
description: Critical alerts or cautions that the character should be aware of, potentially affecting decision-making or gameplay

name: current_plan
description: Outline of the character's current strategy or sequence of intended actions to achieve immediate goals

name: objectives
description: List of primary and secondary goals the player must accomplish to progress in the game, including any time constraints or special conditions
